price: "Kuma bãbu kõwa daga cikinmu,* fãce yanã da matsayi sananne."
arabic: وَمَا مِنَّآ إِلَّا لَهُۥ مَقَامٞ مَّعۡلُومٞ
footnotes: * Malã'iku da sauran halitta duka kõwa yã san matsayinsa na bauta ga Allah wanda ba Ya da dã ko diya, kuma ba Ya da dangantaka da kõwa.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wamā minnā illā lahu maqāmun maʿlūmun
